name: Hop Boy
description:
Hop ! Hop ! Hop !

Help "Hop Boy" to climb as high as possible.
Touch anywhere on the screen to make him jump and reach the top, and avoid obstacles.

Faster you will press, faster "Hop Boy" will get higher.
Catch up precious gems on your way will allow you to have access to new incredibles characters.

Let us warn you: this game is hard !
Are you ready to reach at least 100 points ?

Features of the game:
- Manage your timing to go as high as possible
- Avoid fixed and moving obstacles
- 10 langagues available
- Amazing cartoon style
- Around ten great characters
- Score and leaderboard

SupremApp
